required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Effects of Neramexane on the Pharmacokinetics of a Combined Drospirenone/Ethinyl Estradiol Oral Contraceptive in Healthy Female Subjects

brief_summary.textblock:
Primary:
To assess the effects of repeated dose of Neramexane on the steady-state pharmacokinetics of Drospirenone [DRSP] and Ethinyl Estradiol [EE]
Secondary:
To assess safety and tolerability of concomitant repeated dose treatments of Neramexane and a fixed-combinational DRSP- and EE-containing oral contraceptive [OC] (Yasmin®)

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under Curve within a dose interval (AUC, 0-tau) and Maximum Plasma Concentration at Steady State (Cmax) of Drospirenone (DRSP) and Ethinyl Estradiol (EE)

intervention.description: 25 mg q.d., 3 days 2 x 25 mg b.i.d., 11 days
